### About R markdown and R Notebooks

This is an R Notebook that uses markdown for formatting.  Here are some references for markdown in R and R Notebooks:

* [R Markdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/lesson-1.html)
* [R Notebooks](https://blog.rstudio.com/2016/10/05/r-notebooks)
* [John Gruber's Markdown Project](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/)
* [Markdown Definitive Guide](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/)
